column4: I'm thinking about doing an apt-get dist-upgrade to dapper for xgl. Any thoughts?
xgl is not a good enough reason to upgrade
I have a dual-head setup. Think xgl will work with it?
I really have no idea. When I realized that the window manager for xgl was crippled, I gave it up.
it's only a proof of concept, there's a lot of things that a window manager should handle, like shortcuts, etc that this iteration does not have
